event.description: Coco Crisp walks.
With David DeJesus batting, Coco Crisp steals (6) 2nd base.
David DeJesus called out on strikes.
Mark Teahen flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Jose Guillen walks.
Billy Butler grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Mike Jacobs called out on strikes.
Alberto Callaspo strikes out swinging.
John Buck grounds out, shortstop Maicer Izturis to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Mike Aviles strikes out swinging.
Coco Crisp reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Chone Figgins.
With David DeJesus batting, Coco Crisp steals (7) 2nd base.
David DeJesus flies out to left fielder Juan Rivera.
Mark Teahen grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Jose Guillen flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Billy Butler singles on a fly ball to left fielder Juan Rivera.
Mike Jacobs flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Alberto Callaspo grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to pitcher Matt Palmer.
John Buck called out on strikes.
Mike Aviles pops out to catcher Jeff Mathis in foul territory.
Coco Crisp lines out sharply to third baseman Chone Figgins.
David DeJesus walks.
Mark Teahen singles on a line drive to left fielder Juan Rivera. David DeJesus to 2nd.
Jose Guillen grounds into a force out, third baseman Chone Figgins to second baseman Howie Kendrick. David DeJesus to 3rd. Mark Teahen out at 2nd. Jose Guillen to 1st.
Pitching Change: Darren Oliver replaces Matt Palmer.
Billy Butler doubles (8) on a fly ball to center fielder Torii Hunter. David DeJesus scores. Jose Guillen to 3rd.
Mike Jacobs strikes out swinging.
Alberto Callaspo flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
John Buck flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Willie Bloomquist replaces Mike Aviles.
Willie Bloomquist singles on a ground ball to center fielder Torii Hunter, deflected by pitcher Darren Oliver.
Coco Crisp flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
David DeJesus strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Jose Arredondo replaces Darren Oliver.
Mark Teahen strikes out swinging.
Jose Guillen pops out to first baseman Kendrys Morales in foul territory.
Billy Butler grounds out softly, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Pitching Change: Brian Fuentes replaces Jose Arredondo.
Mike Jacobs strikes out swinging.
Alberto Callaspo grounds out, shortstop Maicer Izturis to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
